experiences.description:
- Assisted users on-site or remotely
- Managed IT assets and provided remote control support via Bomgar
- Hands-on experience with Windows 10 and Active Directory
- Managed a complete IT device fleet along with 2 colleagues at level 2 and a level 3 supervisor
- Created IAM and Active Directory profiles via Azure portal
- Utilized VPN pulse secure and ServiceNow ticketing tool
- Managed content on social networks and ensured compliance with client policies against sensitive, violent, and other prohibited content

- Performed Identity and Access Management for the European Investment Bank
- Created profiles, distribution lists, shared mailboxes, and assigned access according to ITSM protocols
- Managed Smart IT ticketing tool and handled external email legitimacy

- Assisted users via remote support tools and administrative elevations
- Provided client hardware or software technical support through chat (teams), email, and phone
- Controlled remote devices by Teamviewer
- Reset accounts and offered assistance to application users across France
- Handled Windows 7/10, Active Directory, and managed the IT device fleet with 2 colleagues at level 2 and a level 3 supervisor
- Created profiles and managed admin rights through IAM and Active Directory
- Operated Azure portal and VPN pulse secure, with SmartIT as the work tool

- Provided automotive technical service support for Bosch workshops
- Diagnosed faults and errors for service technicians
- Offered after-sales diagnostic software services
- Utilized DDM and ESI Tronic for diagnostics, CDB for ticket management, Genesys for calls, and MS Office for other channels

- Assisted users remotely
- Offered technical support through chat, email, and phone with Bomgar remote control
- Supported Office 365, IAM, Lotus Notes, Adobe, TeamCenter, Ariane, Sharepoint, and Windows 7/10
- Handled escalations to Level 3
- Managed profile creation and admin rights assignments via IAM and Active Directory
- Operated VPN pulse secure, Citrix virtual machines, and ServiceNow tool
- Supported Microsoft Azure console at level 2
- Created Skype profiles, assisted level 1
- Restored Sharepoint and shared files, updated knowledge base, reactivated connected printers, and managed level 2 telephone lines

- Provided remote user assistance
- Technical support through chat, email, and Bomgar remote control
- Supported Office 365, Adobe, TeamCenter, Ariane, Sharepoint, Windows 7/10, Active Directory
- Promoted to Level 2
- Responsible for profile creation and admin rights assignment. Used Azure portal
- Utilized VPN pulse secure, ServiceNow, and Citrix virtual machines
